item.title: Foodpanda has introduced a high-end delivery service in the Central Business District of Singapore
item.description: Source: foodpanda website. In celebration of its third anniversary in Singapore, foodpanda Singapore has introduced a premium delivery service. This service includes approximately 50 restaurants and covers the central business district. It aims to serve busy professionals who want diverse food choices delivered directly to their workplaces. Launched a month after securing US$110 million in funding, this new service reflects the company’s commitment to enhancing user experience and customer service.
